phrs.translation: n. 防风灯；飓风灯；马灯

sentences.sentence: I have been all over the world hunting hurricanes.
sentences.translation: 我在世界各地追寻飓风。

sentences.sentence: In 2008, Cuba was hit by five successive hurricanes, but only seven people were killed.
sentences.translation: 2008年，古巴连续遭受了五次飓风袭击，但只有七人死亡。

sentences.sentence: At the same time, extreme weather events like Category 5 hurricanes are becoming more frequent.
sentences.translation: 与此同时，5级飓风等极端气象事件出现得越来越频繁。
